text: Private Parts is a 1997 comedy movie. It is about Howard Stern during his radio career. Allison Janney plays Dee Dee. Mary McCormack plays Alison Stern. Edie Falco plays Alison's friend. Private Parts made just over $85 million. The movie was released in March 1997. Category:1990s biographical movies Category:1997 comedy movies Category:American biographical movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Betty Thomas
title: Private Parts (movie)
